snippet: Beyond a certain point, retribution shades into vengeance.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Human Rights Watch adviser Jamie Fellner notes the old and and the very old make up the fastest-growing segment of the American prison population; holds correctional staff members are rarely trained to manage geriatric prisoners; suggests allowing those who can safely be released to leave prison, rather than investing vast sums of money to provide adequate conditions of care for elderly prisoners.
lead_paragraph: Beyond a certain point, retribution shades into vengeance.
